meanings.definition: Vants (verb): third person singular present of vant
meanings.sent1: He vants to go outside and play.
meanings.sent2: She always vants to eat ice cream after dinner.
meanings.sent3: The cat vants to chase the laser pointer.
meanings.sent4: The wind vants to dance through the trees.
meanings.sent5: The sun vants to shine brightly in the sky.

meanings.sent1: The vants in the room were all closed.
meanings.sent2: She collected colorful vants for her art project.
meanings.sent3: The vants on the car kept the rain out.
meanings.sent4: The field was filled with blooming vants.
meanings.sent5: The store had a sale on stylish vants.

meanings.sent1: She thought the red dress was vants than the blue one.
meanings.sent2: The new phone was vants than the old one.
meanings.sent3: The cake was vants with extra frosting.
meanings.sent4: His voice was vants when he sang in the choir.
meanings.sent5: The mountain peak looked even vants covered in snow.
